description:
Meet Mallzee- the “Tinder for fashion” shopping app that lets you hold the high street in your hand and shop over 100 stores in one place! 

Welcome to Mallzee, the shopping app where you’ll find over 2 million products from 100 big name fashion brands in one single, amazingly personalised style explosion! (We’re talking ASOS, Topshop, River Island, Miss Selfridge, Topman, Urban Outfitters and more to name drop just a few of our fashion friends)

How to shop? Simple. Swipe right if you like something, swipe left if you don’t! The more you swipe the smarter our system becomes, tailoring your feed as you go to find clothes suited perfectly to your style.

‘It’s Tinder for Fashion but with more WOW moments!’ - Sally, 23, London

Don’t worry Fashionistas, theres a lot more too… 

- UNIQUE STYLE FEEDS - Allow users to create specific outfit searches. Simply set your requirements and watch the options roll in- even when you’re not using the app!
- PRICE DROP ALERTS - Ensure you never miss offers again. Simply swipe right on a product to be instantly notified if it drops in price
- STYLE ADVICE - A totally interactive homepage full of cutting edge style advice from top fashion bloggers and stylists
- SOCIAL - In-app clothes sharing via What’s App, Twitter, Facebook and e-mail allowing you to get a valuable second opinion from the friends who really matter 

We like to think we’ve started a stylish shopping revolution, but don’t just take our word for it…… 

“Mallzee - the must have fashion shopping app!” - Rosie Fortescue, Made in Chelsea 
“Simple, efficient and fun clothes shopping” - Techcrunch 
“Really useful for party wardrobe nightmares!” - ASOS 
“Super-addictive, and… feels really natural- a lot like flicking through a rail of clothes at a store as you’re shopping.” - Glamour 
“You’re either a dedicated fashionista, or have Mallzee” - Forbes 

High street fashion shopping as it should be; download now! 


PS. Give us a shout out on Twitter (@Mallzee) and we’ll draw you your very own super stylish dinosaur as a thank you!
trackCensoredName: Mallzee - Fashion, Shopping, Style Advice, High Street Looks, Trends, Stylists and Sales Shopping
trackName: Mallzee - Fashion, Shopping, Style Advice, High Street Looks, Trends, Stylists and Sales Shopping
releaseNotes:
As always, we’ve got yet more tweaks to make your fashion shopping experience better than ever- these include:
- New infinite scroll (hello heaps more clothes to shop!)
- Sharing to Pinterest 
- Minor bug fixes making Mallzee lightning fast and super stable 
- Lots more jeans, dresses, jumpers, party dresses, Xmas outfits, shoes and more thanks to new Mallzee additions such as All Saints, Aldo and Warehouse.
- Ability to swap between US and UK retailers in the account section
- Internal changes to help us make Mallzee better!
